column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Love the Art Institute!  It is always a delightful spot to while away a few hours downtown. Make sure to allow time to grab a bite or cup of coffee and take some down time between viewing collections. There is so much to see here
column2: you can get overwhelmed if you attempt to take it all in at once!  Instead
column3: pick your "treat" each visit so you can savor it: stop by the modern wing and browse the American artists on display one day. Take a quiet afternoon and enjoy the photography exhibit on the lower level another day. And every visit?  Stop into the expressionist gallery and take a moment with your favorite piece!  Don't forget: in the spring
column5: the Institute gardens are a peaceful
column7: just seconds from the bustle of Michigan Ave. Enjoy!
